experience.description: Develop and maintain core backend services using C++. Collaborate with the infrastructure team to optimize low-latency data processing modules and implement robust unit testing suites to ensure code reliability.
Assisted in the development of RESTful microservices using Java and Spring Boot. Focused on optimizing database query performance and participating in Agile scrum ceremonies to track sprint progress.

metadata.experience_level: Prior internship/job experience(s) in the job field.
